data.name: CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room
data.detailed_description:
CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room is the free dose of a grand CyberPunk opera. The first step in your epic adventure is to get to work on time.

This game has it all:
Pooping.
Getting high.
Incredible fade to black effects. (definitely not used to hide a lack of custom animation)
Procrastination.
Banging soundtrack.
Made by literally one human being.

This description is over. It's time for you to make a decision. Do you wanna play this game or not?

Dev Note: This game has only been tested on a limited variety of PC hardware. If you run into issues with the game, please consider leaving me a message so I can fix the issue for you.

data.short_description: CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room is a walk and click adventure game set in 2053. You've got twenty minutes to get ready for work while solving puzzles and talking to a sarcastic robot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Player can choose to load a vaporizer with a variety of entheogens including medical cannabis, nicotine and caffeine.

Characters use some strong language such as the F word.

Characters discuss alcohol and psychoactive use.
